attributes.action: Request a criminal investigation into the expenses claims by Elliot Morley et al.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That Elliot Morley MP, Andrew MacKay MP and Julie Kirkbride MP all should be investigated by the police for possible fraudulent expenses claims and, should there be grounds, they will be sent to trial as would employees in any other job.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
